name: Hypnagogic Demo
description:
“After a long day you are off to walk home when you receive a text. Things seem a little more intense than usual.”

This is the prototype for the game I’d like to further develop. It had been so long since my game-dev days, was worried I had forgotten how make one, so I tasked myself with building this prototype. All the assets are mine, spare the sound effects that are public domain. It was a fun challenge, having never used Godot before, but here it is. The Hypnagogic Demo.

Special thanks to Lewis, Darcy, and Tineid for encouraging me during this project.

Controls: WASD, Space, Shift, Left Mouse Button

V0.0.1 Basic Prototype
-The  game's phone  popup doesn't work very well in full screen, as it was added last just for this release. It should be an easy fix for the next version.
